data.question: What was the period of world war II ?
What is psychokinesis?
answers: The ability to solve complex problems
The power to move object by physical strength
The ability to control the time
The supposed ability to move objects by mental effort
data.correctAnswer: The supposed ability to move objects by mental effort

data.question: Which of the answers is the correct answer of ADHD disorder?
If all slopes are blops and blops are lazzies then defenitely all slopes are lazzies
answers: Slopes are blops but lazzies aren't slopes!
